title: In critically ill adults, IV fluid bolus infused at slower vs. faster rates did not differ for 90-d mortality.
abstract: Zampieri FG, Machado FR, Biondi RS, et al. Effect of slower vs faster intravenous fluid bolus rates on mortality in critically ill patients: the BaSICS randomized clinical trial. JAMA. 2021;326:830-8. 34547081.
